Alteration 6

Petrify
Combat

effect number [effect_number]: 99
damage [damage]: 999

Petrify:999
 
(Armor Negating [armornegating], May Use Underwater [uwok])
The caster transforms some targets into stone. The target might end up dead when the petrification ends.
Petrified targets have their natural protection increased to 20 and are granted Slash and Pierce resistance. They must make a MR check or die when reverting to their original form. Stone beings, such as living statues, are immune to the spell.
